hi mandana
after unzipping process of arc files (use unzip command in linux=
 or read 
directly from arc file)
you can use html parsers to extract infor=
mation.
have great day






________________________________
From: mandana=
 <mani_khashayar@...>
To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Frida=

Subject: [archive-crawler] number in arcfile

  
hi=
,
I'm beginner in heritrix, and I need to extract the information of sites,=
 when I 
mentioned to arc File I understood it has numbers instead of infor=
mation, 

so can anybody tell me how can I use it? or the code that I can u=
se for extract 
the information ?
thanks a lot in advance.
